column4: My ubuntu box can talk to both eth0 and eth1 networks fine, it's just they won't talk to each other.
I'm actually looking for routing from 192.168.0.0/24 (eth0) to 192.168.1.0/24 (eth1), not a full bridge.
then use: sudo route add -net 192.168.0.0 netmask 255.255.255.0 dev eth0; sudo route add -net 192.168.1.0 netmask 255.255.255.0 dev eth1
